When should management
be transferred?

Expectation ≠ Reality

Your expectations do not correspond to market reality

You were promised an annual return of 20%, but ended up with just 5–8%. We can explain the current market situation and show you how to maximise your returns without making unrealistic promises.

Hidden Costs

Although you are promised low fees, the actual costs are hidden

Other management companies offer a 15% fee, but with 'additional services', this can increase to 25-30%. We provide a full breakdown of the management costs up front, with no surprises or additional fees.

Micromanagement

You're fed up with having to change contractors all the time and solve minor issues

Every simple conflict, whether it's an issue with the cleaning service or an unanswered guest, costs you both nerves and income. We build stable systems with teams and regulations.

Management Options

We offer two options: full management or marketing management.
You remain the owner and we take care of all operational tasks, including welcoming guests and receiving reports. Transparent processes, an on-site team and measurable results.

We manage your property so that you can relax, safe in the knowledge that everything is under control.

Victor Plotnikov

The CEO of the
Farsight Villas & Hotels Management company

Full Management

We take care of everything, from welcoming guests to carrying out repairs and providing full reports.

"It’s actually working really smoothly — I’m really happy with how everything is managed."

Just 4 steps separate you from a noticeable increase in your income

Step 1

Analysis and Preparation

We evaluate the property’s potential, calculate returns, and choose the most suitable management option: full service or marketing only

Step 2

Contract Signing

We sign contracts in your preferred format (paper or online), gather all property details with photos, and review current listings

Step 3

Getting Ready to Launch

We form teams, set up chat rooms, take stock and select staff. We also set up processes and the owner's personal account

Step 4

Start of Rental

We launch the listings, receive the first bookings, and begin promotion. After the test period, we achieve stable income

Still have questions?

We'd be happy to answer them! Submit your request
and our managers will get back to you.
